name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D配信】４周年記念ミニライブ【＃ときのそら4周年】 [s7hakOSsU-I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section where the guests (Suisei, Watame, and Miko) say their goodbyes and leave the stage.
Sora prepares for the next part of the live, humming and drinking water.
Tokino Sora performs a cover of 'Yoru ni Kakeru' (Racing into the Night).

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: なんでもないよ！
subtitles.english: It's nothing!

subtitles.original: ５年目も止まらねーぞで！
subtitles.english: We won't stop in the 5th year either!

subtitles.original: あ、うん！
subtitles.english: Ah, yeah!

subtitles.original: ５年目も止まらねーぞー！
subtitles.english: We won't stop in the 5th year either!

subtitles.original: お、見てるよ！
subtitles.english: Oh, we're watching!

subtitles.original: 見、見、見てるかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if we're watching?

subtitles.original: まだこれからそらちゃんのステージが...
subtitles.english: Sora-chan's stage is still...

subtitles.original: 見てるよ、まだあるからな！
subtitles.english: We're watching, there's still more!

subtitles.original: もう一人ぼっちになっちゃうのかと思って...
subtitles.english: I thought I'd be all alone already...

subtitles.original: いるから、いるからね！
subtitles.english: We're here, we're here!

subtitles.original: いるからね、頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: We're here, do your best!

subtitles.original: 見てるよ、見張ってるよ！
subtitles.english: We're watching, keeping an eye on you!

subtitles.original: 見張ってるのは怖いけど...
subtitles.english: Watching me is scary, but...

subtitles.original: わかった！
subtitles.english: I understand!

subtitles.original: それでは一旦...
subtitles.english: Well then, for now...

subtitles.original: ステージに立つのはここで３人は最後ということで、ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: This is the last time the three of you will be on stage, so thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 頑張ってね！頑張る！
subtitles.english: Do your best! I will!

subtitles.original: しゅっしゅっぱっぱー、しゅっしゅっぱっぱー
subtitles.english: Shu shu pa pa, shu shu pa pa

subtitles.original: しゅしゅでしゃなー
subtitles.english: Shu shu de shana

subtitles.original: 急げ急げ、しゅっしゅっしゅー
subtitles.english: Hurry, hurry, shu shu shu

subtitles.original: お水飲みます
subtitles.english: I'll drink some water

subtitles.original: それでは歌います。
subtitles.english: Well then, I will sing.

subtitles.original: ここからは２曲連続で歌っていこうと思うので、ぜひ皆さん聴いてください。
subtitles.english: From here, I'm going to sing two songs in a row, so please listen to them.

subtitles.original: それでは、どうぞ。
subtitles.english: Here we go.

subtitles.original: 沈むように溶けてゆくように
subtitles.english: Sinking in, as if melting away

subtitles.original: 二人だけの空が広がる夜に
subtitles.english: Into the night where a sky for only the two of us spreads out

subtitles.original: 「さよなら」だけだった、その一言ですべてが分かった
subtitles.english: "Goodbye" was all it took, that one word made me understand everything

subtitles.original: 日が沈み出した空と君の姿
subtitles.english: The sky where the sun began to set and your figure

subtitles.original: フェンス越しに重なっていた
subtitles.english: Overlapping across the fence

subtitles.original: 初めて会った日から僕の心のすべてを奪った
subtitles.english: From the day we first met, you stole all of my heart

subtitles.original: どこか儚い空気を纏う君は
subtitles.english: You, wearing a somewhat ephemeral atmosphere

subtitles.original: 寂しい目をしていたんだ
subtitles.english: Had lonely eyes

subtitles.original: いつだってチックタックと鳴る世界で何度だってさ
subtitles.english: In this world that always goes tick-tock, time and time again

subtitles.original: 触れる心無い言葉うるさい声に涙が零れそうでも
subtitles.english: Even if tears are about to fall at the heartless words and noisy voices

subtitles.original: ありきたりな喜びきっと二人なら見つけられる
subtitles.english: An ordinary joy, I'm sure we can find it if we're together

subtitles.original: 騒がしい日々に笑えない君に
subtitles.english: To you who cannot smile in these noisy days

subtitles.original: 思いつく限り眩しい明日を
subtitles.english: A tomorrow as bright as I can imagine

subtitles.original: 明けない夜に落ちてゆく前に
subtitles.english: Before falling into a night that never ends

subtitles.original: 僕の手を掴んでほら
subtitles.english: Take my hand, look

subtitles.original: 忘れてしまいたくて閉じ込めた日々も
subtitles.english: Even the days I locked away because I wanted to forget them

subtitles.original: 抱きしめた温もりで溶かすから
subtitles.english: I'll melt them with the warmth of my embrace

subtitles.original: 怖くないよいつか日が昇るまで二人でいよう
subtitles.english: It's not scary, let's be together until the sun rises someday

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！
subtitles.english: Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: 君にしか見えない何かを見つめる君が嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate the you who gazes at something only you can see

subtitles.original: 見惚れているかのような恋するようなその顔が嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate that face of yours, as if you're enchanted, as if you're in love

subtitles.original: 信じてたいけど信じれないこと、そんなのどうしたってきっと
subtitles.english: Things I want to believe but can't, no matter what, surely

subtitles.original: これからだっていくつもあってその度怒って泣いてくれる
subtitles.english: There will be many more of those from now on, and each time you'll get angry and cry for me

subtitles.original: それでもきっといつかはきっと僕らはきっと分かり合えるさ信じてるよ
subtitles.english: Even so, surely someday, we'll surely be able to understand each other, I believe in us

subtitles.original: もう嫌だって疲れたんだってがむしゃらに差し伸べる僕の手を振り払う君
subtitles.english: You shake off my hand that I desperately reach out, saying you've had enough, that you're tired

subtitles.original: もう嫌だって疲れたよなんて本当は僕も言いたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to say I've had enough, that I'm tired too, to be honest

subtitles.original: あぁほらまたチックタックと鳴る世界で何度だってさ
subtitles.english: Ah, look, in this world that goes tick-tock again, time and time again

subtitles.original: 君のために用意した言葉ももう届かない
subtitles.english: The words I prepared for you no longer reach you

subtitles.original: 「終わりにしたい」だなんてさ、釣られて言葉にした時
subtitles.english: When I said "I want to end this," lured by your words

subtitles.original: 君は初めて笑った
subtitles.english: You smiled for the first time

subtitles.original: 騒がしい日々に笑えなくなっていた僕の目に映る君は綺麗だ
subtitles.english: To my eyes that had become unable to smile in these noisy days, you look beautiful

subtitles.original: 明けない夜に零れた涙も君の笑顔に...
subtitles.english: The tears that spilled in the night that never ends, into your smile...
